enumValues.name: CHIP_CARD_SUPPORT
enumValues.description: EVSE has a payment terminal that supports chip cards.

enumValues.name: CONTACTLESS_CARD_SUPPORT
enumValues.description: EVSE has a payment terminal that supports contactless cards.

enumValues.name: CREDIT_CARD_PAYABLE
enumValues.description: EVSE has a payment terminal that makes it possible to pay for charging using a credit card.

enumValues.name: DEBIT_CARD_PAYABLE
enumValues.description: EVSE has a payment terminal that makes it possible to pay for charging using a debit card.

enumValues.name: PED_TERMINAL
enumValues.description: EVSE has a payment terminal with a pin-code entry device.

enumValues.name: REMOTE_START_STOP_CAPABLE
enumValues.description: The EVSE can remotely be started/stopped.

enumValues.name: RFID_READER
enumValues.description: Charging at this EVSE can be authorized with an RFID token.

enumValues.name: TOKEN_GROUP_CAPABLE
enumValues.description: This EVSE supports token groups, two or more tokens work as one, so that a session can be started with one token and stopped with another (handy when a card and key-fob are given to the EV-driver).

enumValues.name: UNLOCK_CAPABLE
enumValues.description: Connectors have a mechanical lock that can be requested by the eMSP to be unlocked.
